node.dialog: This is Aventura, a simple dialog engine.
Aventura means adventure in Spanish. The platform was named after its original purpose as a tool for adventure games.
Yes. This is an engine for creating dialog between a human and a computer program.
Well the simplest example is what we are doing right now. You are currently using Aventura to talk to me.
The conversation we are having now is scripted via XML.
XML is a popular standard for formatting data

node.player: What can someone do with Aventura?
node.dialog: You can easily script complex and dynamic conversations with minimal training
Think of it like a flow chart. You start at the beginning and based on the users choices Aventura chooses the correct text to show. It can also fire certain actions based on different events.
Triggers can be added to the script to activate other options which where not previously available
